title: go.talks/zen cannot move past slide #3
body:
by **cppcoder**: 
What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

1.  Navigate to http://talks.golang.org/2012/zen.slide
2.  Try to scroll past the third slide

What happened?
Unable to go past slide #3, as if there is no more content

What should have happened instead?
Should go to slide 4

Please provide any additional information below.
OSX Versions 10.8.4 and 10.7.5
Google Chrome Version 35.0.1916.153
